title: HOUR 2 - Fields, Gilmore, Durant
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Fields, Gilmore, Durant
description:
The Bears are starting Justin Fields

Stephon Gilmore is going to Carolina

Kevin Durant made a mistake leaving Steph Curry to play with Kyrie Irving


Guest: Joel Klatt
